VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `v_mutasi_sebagian` AS select `aa`.`Id` AS `Id`,`aa`.`id_bukuinduk` AS `id_bukuinduk`,`aa`.`idbi_awal` AS `idbi_awal`,`aa`.`a1` AS `a1`,`aa`.`a` AS `a`,`aa`.`b` AS `b`,`aa`.`c1` AS `c1`,`aa`.`c` AS `c`,`aa`.`d` AS `d`,`aa`.`e` AS `e`,`aa`.`e1` AS `e1`,`aa`.`tgl_buku` AS `tgl_buku`,`aa`.`ket` AS `ket`,`aa`.`nosk` AS `nosk`,`aa`.`tglsk` AS `tglsk`,`aa`.`harga` AS `harga`,`aa`.`luas` AS `luas`,`aa`.`noreg` AS `noreg`,`aa`.`thn_perolehan` AS `thn_perolehan`,`aa`.`f` AS `f`,`aa`.`g` AS `g`,`aa`.`h` AS `h`,`aa`.`i` AS `i`,`aa`.`j` AS `j`,`aa`.`tgl_update` AS `tgl_update`,`aa`.`uid` AS `uid`,`aa`.`tgl_create` AS `tgl_create`,`aa`.`uid_create` AS `uid_create`,`aa`.`nilai_susut` AS `nilai_susut`,`dd`.`alamat` AS `alamat`,`dd`.`sertifikat_tgl` AS `sertifikat_tgl`,`dd`.`sertifikat_no` AS `sertifikat_no`,`dd`.`status_hak` AS `status_hak`,`aa`.`nilai_buku` AS `nilai_buku`,`aa`.`idbi_baru` AS `idbi_baru`,`bb`.`c` AS `c_lama`,`bb`.`d` AS `d_lama`,`bb`.`e` AS `e_lama`,`bb`.`harga` AS `hrg_perolehan`,`bb`.`kondisi` AS `kondisi`,`bb`.`e1` AS `e1_lama`,`bb`.`c1` AS `c1_lama`,`cc`.`nm_barang` AS `nm_barang` from (((`mutasi_sebagian` `aa` left join `kib_a` `dd` on((`aa`.`id_bukuinduk` = `dd`.`idbi`))) left join `ref_barang` `cc` on(((`aa`.`f` = convert(`cc`.`f` using utf8)) and (`aa`.`g` = convert(`cc`.`g` using utf8)) and (`aa`.`h` = convert(`cc`.`h` using utf8)) and (`aa`.`i` = convert(`cc`.`i` using utf8)) and (`aa`.`j` = convert(`cc`.`j` using utf8))))) left join `buku_induk` `bb` on((`aa`.`id_bukuinduk` = `bb`.`id`)))
